org.eclipse.keyple.distributed

Interface LocalServiceClient


  • public interface LocalServiceClient
    API of the Local Service Client associated to the Remote Plugin Server.

    This service must be started by the application installed on a Client having local access to the smart card reader but wishes to delegate all or part of the ticketing processing to a remote application :

    • To start the service, use the factory LocalServiceClientFactory.
    • To access the service, use the utility method LocalServiceClientUtils.getLocalService().
    • To stop the service, there is nothing special to do because the service is a standard java singleton instance.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T executeRemoteService(RemoteServiceParameters parameters, java.lang.Class<T> classOfT)
      Allows you to connect a local card reader to a remote server and execute a specific ticketing service from the server.

    • Method Detail

      • executeRemoteService

        <T> T executeRemoteService(RemoteServiceParameters parameters,
                           java.lang.Class<T> classOfT)
        Allows you to connect a local card reader to a remote server and execute a specific ticketing service from the server.

        The service is identify by the serviceId parameter.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic type of the expected user output data.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The service parameters (serviceId, ...) (see RemoteServiceParameters documentation for all possible parameters).
        classOfT - The class of the expected user output data.
        Returns:
        a new instance of T.
        Since:
        1.0
